mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article ( imgurl, pc, form, data, profile, title, url ) VALUES ( #{imgurl}, #{pc}, #{form}, #{data}, #{profile}, #{title}, #{url} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.* from article as a LEFT JOIN item_article as ia on a.id=ia.article_id LEFT JOIN item as i on ia.item_id=i.id where i.id=#{itemid}
